title: Elucidating the deactivation mechanism of beta zeolite catalyzed linear alkylbenzene production with oxygenated organic compound contaminated feedstocks
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9243-9253
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00787E, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shiyong Xing, Xiaofei Liu, Yan Cui, Yuehua Zhao, Ziheng Chen, Sigui Xiang, Minghan Han
Oxygenated organic compounds are detrimental to the zeolite catalyzed linear alkylbenzene production, which is mainly due to their firm adsorption on the acid sites.
